collection_holder_name: New York Public Library for the Performing Arts, Dorothy and Lewis B. Cullman Center
pageContext.collection_title: Dimitri Mitropoulos conducts Choral symphony no. 9 : radio broadcast, 1955-04-17 / music by Beethoven ; text by Schiller.
pageContext.collection_description: Frances Yeend, soprano ; Martha Lipton, mezzo-soprano ; David Lloyd, tenor ; Mack Harrell, baritone ; Westminster Choir ; John Finley Williamson, choir conductor ; New York Phiharmonic Symphony Orchestra ; Dimitri Mitropoulos, conductor.
